title: Unexpected Odds
description: They say the mistakes of our past shape our future. That weâ€™re molded from experience, from heartache, and from pain. What happens when your past is riddled with regrets? How do you see through the fog, to navigate the path to your future? One breath.One second.One minute.One hour.One day at a time, you learn to live with your unexpected odds.
author: Kaylee Ryan
